{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=WL-600g |revision= |asin= |fcc_date=08/11/2006 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=MSQWL600G |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6348 |cpu1_cspeed=256 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320CTTC-90G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S641632K-UC60 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pln header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318;BCM4318KFBG, HD0726 P11, 827058 85A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E;BCM5325EKQMG, RG0721 P11, 824058 1A; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=USB 2.0 4-port PCI Host Controller;VIA;VT6212L;VIA, VT6212L, 0716CD, 23B7034591; |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_boot=CFE;1.0.37-0.8;(BCM96348); |stock_os=Linux;2.6.8.1; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:1D:60 |oui_eth=00:1D:60 }} {{TagLine|802.11b/g Wireless DSL Modem Router}} :[http://www.asus.com/Networks/ADSL_Modem_Routers/WL600g/ Product page] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/wl600g On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?15274-WL-600g-%C4%EE%F0%E0%E1%EE%F2%EA%E0-%EF%F0%EE%F8%E8%E2%EA%E8-%E4%EB%FF-%F1%E5%F0%E8%E8-ADSL-%F0%EE%F3%F2%E5%F0%EE%E2&langid=3&p=219907#post219907 On the '''wl500g.info''' forums] (int. images) :There is a '''VIA''' VT6212L USB 2.0 controller on-board. ===Serial=== {{SCollapse|boot log |
